content: Second Half_2, Colorado, Cabral, 2 (Rubio), 65th; 3, Colorado, Lewis, 1 (Ronan), 81st; 4, Los Angeles Galaxy, Judd, 1, 89th.Goalies_Colorado, William Yarbrough, Marko Ilic; Los Angeles Galaxy, Jonathan Klinsmann, Novak Micovic.Yellow Cards_Cabral, Colorado, 28th; Aude, Los Angeles Galaxy, 45th+1; Nicholson, Colorado, 52nd; Neal, Los Angeles Galaxy, 90th+4.Referee_Ramy Touchan.
